name: Mushrooms Unite
description:
Mushrooms Unite.

This small but fun platformer has an interesting main mechanic: The ability to freeze time! This lets you TRIPLE JUMP.

To triple jump, freeze time by pressing the down key. Once time is frozen, unfreeze it by pressing the down key again. After freezing time you get an extra jump.

The controls for the game are:

Move - Left and Right arrow keys

Jump - Up arrow key

Freeze Time - Down Arrow Key

Skip CutScene - Down Arrow Key

Music by a pog fish. I'll link their social if they make one.
